title: Macron meets with Putin, leading Europe's diplomatic efforts to diffuse Ukraine crisis
content:
1. Macron meets with Putin, leading Europe's diplomatic efforts to diffuse Ukraine crisis  CNN
  2. France's Macron flies to Moscow as a new round of talks over Ukraine begins  NPR
  3. Watch Live: Biden and German Chancellor Scholz Discuss Russia-Ukraine Crisis  The New York Times
  4. France’s Macron flies to meet Putin in risky bid to avert war  CNBC
  5. Kremlin is top destination for spooked European leaders  Honolulu Star-Advertiser
